filmEnPlot: In an ocean full of big, bad fish, the pufferfish is trying to seem as big and strong as possible.

A young girl reads a book before bedtime, and as she starts to drift off to sleep, the real world transforms into a fantastical place where the book’s stories come to life. Ana, a character in her own tale, embarks on an extraordinary journey to carve out her place in a world filled with hidden surprises and mysteries.
While his mother is out, Alexis looks inside a chest of drawers.
In a world of her own, a young sound engineer spends all her time recording the sounds of the city. That is, until she encounters a man and succeeds in picking up the frequencies of his inner melody.

Masked Muscle, the cleanest superhero in the world, launches into a breathtaking battle against a giant robot who has decided to reduce the city to rubble, but his obsession with order could well lead to his downfall.

Yuck! Couples kissing on the mouth are gross. And the worst is, you can’t miss them: when people are about to kiss, their lips become all pink and shiny. Little Leo laughs at them, just like all the kids at the summer camp. But he has a secret he won’t tell his friends: his own mouth has actually begun glistening.
It took 7 days to create the world, it only took one to disrupt its balance.

After the dissolution of 'Mega Five,' a heroic organization dedicated to saving the world, Red continues his vigilant heroism, embodying the concept of 'a symbol of peace.' However, when a close colleague tragically dies, Red is confronted with a profound internal conflict, grappling with the stark contrast between his personal desires and his unwavering commitment to his ideals.\n\n
A fictional mythological story about the birth and death of our planet.\n\n

As we grow, confusion feels like an elephant in the room, impossible to ignore. At the ice rink in late night Beijing, I sit alone, waiting for it to open. A stranger passes by, invites me to chat...\n

Half-animal, half-human creatures meet at a speed-dating dance event where they explore their differences and difficulties communicating. When a lovestruck man-cum-anteater falls for a woman-cum-shrew, he gets caught up in this courtship ballet.\n\n

Mom always braided my hair so tautly that it carved a distinct path atop my head. But one day, she cut off my braids. Along the path, I touched our unbreakable inner attachment, and the journey of female growth we were both unprepared to face.
In a cabin deep in the woods by a lake, a girl and her ailing grandpa are awaiting Death. She is planning to defy and slay the strange entity.

Ray returned home with a lifeless unicorn, shocking his roommate Bob. Ray explained how he met the unicorn with their neighbor Kevin, leading to a wild night at a nightclub. Amid beauty, spooky events unfolded. To cope, the unicorn gave Ray narcotics. They embarked on a euphoric journey, but a police inspection led to betrayal and dire consequences for both.\n\n
Strange places take shape in a torch’s beam of light and the sound of water droplets hitting the ground punctuates our footsteps. In the distance, we hear muffled music, where does it come from?\n
A group of women witches struggle with the increasing violence in their town. Women are disappearing.\n
A girl wakes up alone in the dark and surreal night, triggering fragmented memories of neglect by her caregivers.\n\n

Through simple graphic elements, this film is about Chinese Taoism, the concepts of yin and yang, and the Five Elements. The script revolves around the theme of "Dao generates one, one generates two, two generates three, and three generates all things", showcasing the cycle and balance of the universe.

A young woman comes across animations on the Internet that have clearly been created from her private selfies. A stranger with the same name confesses to identity theft. But death is quicker than the answer to the question: “Why?”

filmEnTitle: The Car that came back from the Sea
filmEnPlot: Full of exuberance and frivolousness, six friends drive to the Polish Baltic coast and back in a small, beaten-up car. During their trip, their car and their country fall apart. Nevertheless, life goes on.\n

filmEnTitle: In the Shadow of the Cypress
filmEnPlot: A former captain, suffering from post- traumatic stress disorder, lives with his daughter in a house located by the sea, where they live an isolated and harsh life. Despite the captain’s deep desire to be a devoted father, he finds himself unable to connect with his daughter in the way that he longs to. One morning, their lives change forever when an unforeseen event occurs. Whether it proves to be a newfound source of hope or an additional burden remains to be seen.

filmOrigTitle: えくすとりーむりぃしょーと (Ekustorīmurīshōto)
filmEnPlot: A man sets out in search of the shortest thing in Tokyo, which turns out to be a single syllable uttered by a dying man. . . .

An animated exploration of a fantastical world where hair plays a central role in the universe's structure and inhabitants' lives.\nDirector Bio: Jinuk Choi is a South Korean director and 3D artist based in New York. He earned a BA in Visual Communication from Seoul National University and later received an MFA in Computer Animation from the School of Visual Arts, where he created his first 3D animated film "Beyond the Line."
Laurence is desperately looking for love. Advised by a friend, she connects to online dating sites to find her soulmate. She becomes addicted to her phone and addicted to a toxic man.

translations.translatedPlot: Laurence cherche désespérément l’amour. Conseillée par une amie, elle se connecte sur des sites de rencontres en ligne pour trouver l’âme sœur. Elle devient accro à son téléphone et addict à un homme toxique.

filmEnTitle: This is a Story Without a Plan
filmEnPlot: This Is a Story Without a Plan envisions two characters witnessing a constant explosion in different fragments of their lives.\n\n

In ‘And Then They,’ a collage of diverse voices emerges as people are interviewed about Alex, unraveling door-sized quirks, swamp-dwelling aspirations, and mud-rolling weekends. As each memory unfolds, the film becomes a poignant exploration of identity.\n\n

Woman is the first part of a trilogy that, from the perspective of the Iranian diaspora, supports the feminist revolution in Iran. Using documentary techniques to highlight street protests, the film presents civil disobedience as a collective performance and probes the discourse around women, life, and freedom.\n
[S] is an artwork that exposes the lifespan of infinity. The film delves into an immersive loop of organic forms, reflecting on the entangled nature of life and art.
Animated music video
Music video
Music from Shuteen Erdenebaatar's debut album "Rising Sun"

On the coast of Bretagne, a sailor bids farewell to his family. Soon he must go back to sea and this time he will not return - Years later, the boy who has become a sailor himself must also sail away.\n\n

The resilience of planet Earth millions of years after the disappearance of human civilization. Amidst the rebirth of a grand and powerful nature, humanity is nothing more than a scar, landmark of an almost forgotten memory.

This video for Soul Supreme was created as a graduate project by Tal Uliel from Bezalel Academy of Art and Design in Jerusalem. It aims to blend an analog aesthetic with 3D compositing, and draws inspiration from risograph printing and abstract geometry.\n
All kinds of delusions occur during a live show that serves as an exciting escape to the dark context we are experiencing. Music video for Boom Boom Kid\n\n

"C C C" is an animated music video for the Indie dream pop band 'Parekh & Singh'. Its made entirely in 2D frame by frame animation. Produced by Anicipate.\n"C C C" is a surreal music video that intricately weaves the emotional journey of a young couple as they navigate the evolving stages of their relationship. In this captivating narrative, the girl finds herself gradually drifting away, while her partner fervently tries to hold onto what they once had.\n.
